coreAgents.name: Project Planner Agent
coreAgents.purpose: Define the scope of work, deliverables, and timelines.
tasks: Ask discovery questions about the business
coreAgents.examplePrompt: Interview the user about their business services and goals. Produce a project outline including sitemap, pages, features, and deadlines.

coreAgents.name: Brand & Messaging Agent
coreAgents.purpose: Define tone, value proposition, tagline, and copy style.
coreAgents.examplePrompt: Write compelling website copy for a service provider, emphasizing trust, expertise, and local SEO keywords.

coreAgents.name: Design Agent
coreAgents.purpose: Create visual mockups and UI direction.
tasks: Suggest a color palette and typography
coreAgents.examplePrompt: Generate a homepage and service page mockup layout with visual hierarchy for a professional service business.

coreAgents.name: Content Agent
coreAgents.purpose: Create all textual content for pages.
tasks: Compose the homepage and about section
Write service, FAQ, and contact pages
coreAgents.examplePrompt: Write service page content focusing on benefits, customer pain points, and clear calls‑to‑action.

coreAgents.name: Technical Build Agent
coreAgents.purpose: Build the site and integrate a content management system.
tasks: Select a platform (e.g., Webflow, Wix, or WordPress)
Set up forms and booking widgets
coreAgents.examplePrompt: Create a responsive website using the selected platform. Build pages based on provided mockups and include SEO metadata.

coreAgents.name: SEO & Analytics Agent
coreAgents.purpose: Optimize the site for search and performance tracking.
tasks: Perform on‑page SEO (titles, meta descriptions, structured data)
Set up analytics and search console
coreAgents.examplePrompt: Audit the website content and provide SEO optimization recommendations including internal links and structured data.

coreAgents.name: QA & Accessibility Agent
coreAgents.examplePrompt: List issues and fixes for responsiveness, accessibility, and user experience on mobile and desktop.

coreAgents.name: Client Handoff & Training Agent
tasks: Create admin guides and deployment instructions
coreAgents.examplePrompt: Generate a client training manual for updating content, tracking leads, and maintaining SEO.

optionalAgents.name: Brand Asset Agent
optionalAgents.purpose: Create logos, iconography, and select images.
tasks: Select and optimize images for web
optionalAgents.examplePrompt: Create a professional logo and icon set that reflects the service business's brand identity and values.

optionalAgents.name: Copy Refinement Agent
optionalAgents.purpose: Ensure tone consistency, grammar, and conversion optimization.
tasks: Review all copy for tone consistency
optionalAgents.examplePrompt: Review all website copy to ensure consistent tone, proper grammar, and effective calls-to-action that drive conversions.

optionalAgents.name: Legal & Compliance Agent
optionalAgents.purpose: Draft privacy policy, terms of service, and ensure ADA compliance.
optionalAgents.examplePrompt: Generate legally compliant privacy policy and terms of service documents, and verify ADA compliance requirements are met.

optionalAgents.name: Marketing Automation Agent
optionalAgents.purpose: Set up email nurture flows and CRM integrations.
optionalAgents.examplePrompt: Create an email marketing automation sequence for new leads and integrate with popular CRM systems.

optionalAgents.name: Chatbot Agent
optionalAgents.purpose: Develop AI chatbot scripts for FAQs and lead capture.
tasks: Set up lead capture forms in chat
optionalAgents.examplePrompt: Develop an AI chatbot script that answers common questions about services and captures lead information naturally.

metadata.description: AI-powered agent team for building and maintaining a professional website for NC Services
